question: Who are the Aboriginal peoples in Canada?
possible_answers: A. The first settlers of Newfoundland
B. The first European settlers to arrive in Canada
C. The descendants of the first Australian immigrants to Canada
D. The first inhabitants of Canada
main_question: Who are the Aboriginal peoples in Canada?
answer: D. The first inhabitants of Canada
explanatory_sentence: The ancestors of Aboriginal peoples are believed to have migrated from Asia many thousands of years ago.
